basics.name: JT Twggs
basics.label: Data Analyst / Data Scientist
basics.summary: Local to Southern Utah, I am a data analyst with a passion for data science and machine learning. I have experience in Python, SQL, and R, and I am always looking to learn new skills and technologies. I am a team player who enjoys collaborating with others to solve complex problems.

work.name: AI Tutoring Bot - Talos AI
work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

projects.name: Tutoring Center Dashboard Application
projects.description: A dashboard application that provides insights into the tutoring center's average visit times and tutoring resource usage.

projects.name: Severe Weather Analysis
projects.description: Project client: Western Electricity Coordination Council (WECC). Logistic Regression to predict the probability of severe weather in given conditions.
